entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Bay Roberts
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:02 AM NST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries. High zero.
entry.summary: Freezing drizzle or flurries changing to flurries near noon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow mixed with rain. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Snow becoming mixed with periods of rain in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 40 gusting to 60 near noon. Temperature steady near zero. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. High zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. High plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Cloudy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Windy. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 10 March 2023
